Posts.Content: In Feb 2013 I had 1st cancer diagnosis of bladder cancer. My PSA at time was 2.3 after several tumor removals from bladder repeated PSA and in Feb 2014 it was 9.6 so long story short had radical prostatectomy with removal of left nerve bundle, seminal vesicles, lymphoid nodes because MRI showed it more advanced than gleason score of 7. Now 5 months after went for PSA test 2 times my levels are 0.91? I am scared i am only 52yr old appointment with doctor is Tuesday but an not sure what next steps are.. HELP
Posts.Title: New Member LOST SCARED
